Move this character t an adjacent location
This character ignores its Role and is a Person instead.
At the end of the day, if there are 3 or more total counters on this character, he dies.
At the start of the day, if this character is dead, place 'Part-Timer(?)' in the City.
This character has the same Role, and is the Culprit of the same Incident(s), as Part-Timer.
Reveal this character's Role. Place 2 Goodwill counters on any character at this location.
If this character is the culprit of an Incident that resolves, its effects resolve twice.
Choose a character other than this one who is at their Paranoia Limit. Place a Goodwill counter on that character.
Choose a character other than this one at this location who is at their Paranoia Limit. Reveal that character's Role.
During script creation, this character cannot be given a Role from the Plots. Instead of being a Person, he gains the Role of another character, ignoring Role limitations.
Reveal the name of each character that shares this character's Role. This cannot be refused by Goodwill Refusal. This can only be used on Loop 2 onward.

If the Rich Man's Daughter or Boss would move from this character's location, she moves with that character, ignoring her original movement if needed (if this could move her in multiple ways, the Leader decides which). If the Rich Man's Daughter or Boss is at her location and would die, she dies instead.
Choose any other character in play. For the remainder of the Loop, that character is also included in the above Passive ability.
Place 1 Hope or Despair counter on any character at this location. If this character has Goodwill Refusal and at least 1 Goodwill counter, the Mastermind may use this ability as their own
During script creation, this character cannot be given a Role with Goodwill Refusal.
Use a Goodwill ability from an Adult at this location, ignoring Goodwill counters. It cannot be refused by Goodwill Refusal, but counts towards that ability's 'Once per Loop' limit.

During each Goodwill ability phase, the Leader may move 1 counter from this character to another character at this location. If this character has Goodwill Refusal, the Mastermind must also do this during the Mastermind's ability phase.
